title: Remco Evenepoel Quashes Red Bull Rumors, Shifts Focus to Pogačar and Zürich Worlds Clash
content:
Backed by a powerful Belgian team, Evenepoel eyes a rare double-double after his Olympic triumph: 'The race can open up at any time.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Quashes Red Bull Rumors, Shifts Focus to Pogačar and Zürich Worlds Clash on Velo.
author: ahood
